summary: This is an email chain from July 2020 regarding a request to obtain and forward photographs of an individual (likely a victim or witness) that were taken by Jeffrey Epstein. The sender is assisting the recipient in identifying the person and authorizes the photos to be provided to them.

events.title: Photographs taken of individual
events.description: Reference pictures of an individual were taken around 2008 or 2009, closer to the time when Epstein pictures were taken.

events.title: Phone conversation about photographs
events.description: A phone conversation occurred on the preceding Friday, discussing the request to obtain Epstein-related pictures.

keyFacts: An individual has been requesting for years to obtain pictures that were taken of them by Jeffrey Epstein.
Reference photos from 2008 or 2009 are provided to assist in identifying the individual, who is now over a decade older.
The correspondence is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs, indicating legal sensitivity.
The email authorizes the provided pictures to be shared with the requesting individual.
